post:
UltraVPS.eu is a brand of Bradler & Krantz GmbH Co KG. Founded in 1999 and headquarted in Bochum, Germany, our company is one of the most established European hostng providers. With our brand UltraVPS.eu we provide high-performance, enterprise-grade Virtual Servers for a very affordable price.

**Here's our special Black Friday offer!**

Cloud-BF
--------

* 1 GB RAM
* 1 CPU Core
* 30 GB redundant SSD storage
* KVM virtualization
* 1 TB Monthly Transfer
* 1 IPv4 address
* 10 IPv6 addresses (from your own /64 IPv6 subnet)
* Contract term: 12 months

20 EUR per year incl. VAT (~ 17.80 USD excl. VAT)

Availabe in 4 locations
-------------------

* Amsterdam http://lg.ams.nl.ultravps.eu/
* Duesseldorf: http://lg.dus.de.ultravps.eu/
* Dallas: http://lg.dal.us.ultravps.eu/
* Los Angeles: http://lg.lax.us.ultravps.eu/

[Order now](https://www.ultravps.eu/en/order/order.pl?cat=cloudserver)

_This offer is valid for new orders till Monday, 28/10/2016._
